interfaces.kernel

Interface JCL_message_commons

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Constant, JCL_message, java.io.Serializable

    public interface JCL_message_commons
extends JCL_message, Constant
    Version:
    1.0 Enables any message coded as an array of strings (not control ones). such messages are used to call servers and slaves
    Author:
    Joubert

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface interfaces.kernel.Constant
